Overview#

resetTile

void resetTile(int x, int y) { m_tiles[getTileIndex(x,y)] = MinimapTile(); }

getTileIndex

uint getTileIndex(int x, int y) { return ((y % MMBLOCK_SIZE) * MMBLOCK_SIZE) + (x % MMBLOCK_SIZE); }

mustUpdate

justSaw

getBlockIndex#

Sygnatura: uint getBlockIndex(const Position& pos) { return ((pos.y / MMBLOCK_SIZE) * (65536 / MMBLOCK_SIZE)) + (pos.x / MMBLOCK_SIZE); }
